body.name: Chefwave Silicone Popcorn Popper (Red) - Reusable, Collapsible Microwave Popcorn Bowl - Dishwasher Safe

features: Healthy Snacking: Say goodbye to artificial ingredients and excessive sodium in most prepackaged microwave popcorn. With our silicone popcorn popper microwave collapsible, you control what goes into your popcorn snack. Whip up 15 cups of mouthwatering popcorn in minutes! Perfectly seasoned and ready for family gatherings. We've covered your popcorn snacking, whether you like it with or without oil.

Popcorn Perfection: Dive into the ultimate popcorn experience! Our durable silicone microwave popcorn maker guarantees quick, flawless results every time. Hassle-free cleaning popcorn bowl, and built to last - invest in the only popcorn set you'll ever need. Make every movie night a gourmet treat with Chefwave's microwave popcorn silicon bowl!

Compact & Convenient: This popcorn popper collapses effortlessly, making it the perfect fit for any kitchen, travel adventure, or college dorm. Maximize your space with style with Chefwave's 2 in 1 popcorn popper & bowl!

Easy-to-Use: Fill the popper, place with lid in the microwave (start with 2 mins to test your microwave's power), handle with oven mitts post-popping, and enjoy. clean effortlessly with warm soapy water or in the dishwasher.

No Hassle, Chefwave's Guarantee: We are confident in the quality of our popper and stand behind it with a 100% guarantee. if any issues arise, contact us, and we'll make it right. Purchase now with the assurance that this product will meet your expectations, guaranteed. Happy popping!

productInformation.value: #26,397 in Kitchen & Dining (See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining) #54 in Popcorn Poppers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for travel and for amount of popcorn sizes
reviews.reviewText: With how much popcorn I've been eating lately I was getting very frustrated buying the microwave bags. 1. Sometimes I can finish a full bag but sometimes I just want a smaller snack. 2. I can now pop my popcorn with however much butter, oil, spices, or treats I want. 3. I feel as though I am making efforts to save the environment from the paper bag popcorn.It is also a great travel companion as the bowl is collapsible when not in use.The only problem I face is how hot the bowl is when taking it out of the microwave but I also felt that when taking popcorn bags out of the microwave as well.It's easy to clean and easy to use. Perfect for my regular popcorn fix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This popper works wonderfully! You can make a whole bowl in less than 3 mins! There are two measurements marked in the bowl and I tend to stick to the smaller of the two which pops as much as you would get in a regular sized bag of microwave popcorn. However this is more like air popped popcorn. You can add butter to the bowl before you pop the corn. But to me it doesn't really change the flavor much. You can always melt butter and pour it over too. I also love that the bowl colapses and takes up less space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit flimsy, but it works
reviews.reviewText: Works fine for making popcorn. Silicone is pretty thin, so don’t grip it too hard or you’ll spill. It’s also pretty hot getting out of the microwave, so be aware of that, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Popcorn pops up over the rim
reviews.reviewText: Using the lower line, popcorn just gills the bowl. If you measure kernels to the higher line the lid will raise up about 4”! Still it makes great popcorn for a fraction of the price of microwave bags. We melt butter. Split into 2 serving bowls. Add the butter. Salt and enjoy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use air popper
reviews.reviewText: Holds just enough popcorn for two. Storage is made easy because it is collapsible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not last
reviews.reviewText: The first three times it worked fine on 2 minutes setting. The fourth time it burned after only 90 seconds, same amount of popcorn. I would not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattens flat with lid for easy small storage
reviews.reviewText: Pops a full container of popcorn in less than 3 minutes. I add a spray of olive oil and pre-salt for flavor. Easy to clean. Wish I had purchased this sooner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, won’t break, and pops up almost all the kernels
